website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for plus-sized cats or co-sleeping kitties, this perch boasts a generous weight limit and extra length to accommodate heavier loads.
pros: Robust construction with strong PVC tubes is perfect for rotund furballs or inseparable companions
Industrial strength suction cups paired with stainless steel cables deliver unwavering stability
Durable fabric cover is comfortable, breathable, and can easily be removed for washing
Comes with an extra suction cup
cons: Extra length may not fit standard windows

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Perch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bosco loves his new perch! It wasn't up 2 minutes before he claimed it as his. Bosco is a good 15 pound cat and there doesn't seem to be any strain at all on it. Now the other two cats have to wait for him to get off of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, one weighs approx. 10 lbs the other 13 lbs. Both fit on this and it feels surprisingly sturdy. At first our cats wouldn't use it but then we put a blanket on it to make it more cozy and that changed everything. Now they sleep on it all the time. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: jfw1021

customer_reviews.title: New views in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my cats all seem to congregate on the window sills. This allows them to fit comfortably together and sunbathe or watch outside. It is sturdy enough to hold both of my hefty cats. They are enjoying the new views in comfort
customer_reviews.author: J. G

customer_reviews.title: Very Weak Product
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy for the product for a few weeks until it broke under my cat one day. The suction wasn't the issue like most products like this but the fragile plastic tubing was that surround the bed. Since, two of the plastic tubes have snapped under my 7 lb cat. The product description says it can carry a cat weighing 60 lbs! I'd recommend you do not buy this as it can't even hold my cat thats 1/3rd the advertised weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mehdizadeh

customer_reviews.title: Great Perch
customer_reviews.text: Binx really likes it. He got in it right away. Easy to assemble and install. Took a while for the suction cups to stick, but once its stuck, it stayed. I received an email from the seller regarding faulty connectors and replacements would be sent if needed. At first I didn't need it, but then I noticed after a couple of weeks how the perch was caved in. I responded to the email and asked for the replacement connectors. They arrived really fast and ever since then the perch is in tact. Great customer service. Get this perch, it's simple to put together and your kitty will love it.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: I suggest this for cats under 8 lbs.  Mine broke
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was glowing. Now less than a week later the pvc pipe is bent and unfixable. Gonna have to return.
customer_reviews.author: ilanad

customer_reviews.title: Someone spent a lot of time on this cat perch’s quality.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one. The other, more expensive ones are crap when compared to this one. Everything about this product is made well. I compared a handful of other products and this was the only one that is built tough and thoughtful. It’s all quality plastic, not crap junk plastic. The suction cups at top quality and the lines that hold it up are plastic coated metal. This product is made extremely well and with top quality products. Durable, washable, and the cat is already on it. The seller include cat toys and extra suction cups, white circles and carbena hook. No doubt it can handle 2 large Cats comfortably . Do measure first! Really impressive craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: I returned this because when the cat jumped on it ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because when the cat jumped on it came off the window hurt my baby now she won't even jump in the window very upsetting for me in the cat
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN DUFRENE mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups don't work
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups don't stick. I cleaned the cups and glass per the instructions but one of the cups failed after less than a day. I stuck it back to the window a couple of times, but every time my cat set foot on the hammock the cup gave way again.
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This item is junk! The Suction cups included are not strong enough to hold it to the window. Every morning, I come out and find that it is “unstuck” from the glass. Twice, my averaged-sized cat jumped up and went crashing to the ground. I have removed it, and is now in my trash pile...total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mannion

customer_reviews.title: Our Bengals love this perch
customer_reviews.text: Our two Bengals love this window perch and it is really strong enough to hold two of them without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, different brands. This one was not as good as my first. Because the effectiveness of the product is dependent on high-tension, putting it together requires more than a small amount of strength. I made sure to clean the surface of the glass before attempting to attach it to the window. I have a 16 lb cat. The other window cat bed has no problem holding him up; this one falls every time he tries to jump on it. It has become a respite for my 9 lb cat and doesn't seem to have a suction problem with her. If you have a heftier kitty, maybe go with a different model.
customer_reviews.author: cornellk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for 3 months now and one of the upper suction cups stopped working and I cannot find replacement parts. Seller offered "free" replacement suction cups and adhesive discs but I would have to spend $2.00 less than I paid for the perch just for the shipping. Not to helpful as I could spend a little more for an entire upgraded version of the whole perch. My cats love sunning themselves in the window while it worked and I feel bad about not fixing it for them but I will find something else to put in it's place.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are definitely able to support the weight.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical whether suction cups could reliably hold the weight of my 20 lb Maine Coon, but I have to admit: these suckers are stroooooong. Like, REALLY strong. I'm now confident that supporting the weight won't be an issue. The material of the hammock bed is most definitely NOT cotton, however, as the listing claims. Instead, it seems to be made of the same type of fabric that is most often used in outdoor sun shades/privacy screens (a type of polyethylene). I plan to put some kind of cushion or blanket over it so not a huge issue, just felt it was work mentioning since it differs from whats advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sig Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy Misha weighs 15 lbs, climbed in got comfortable. Cat happy , wife happy, daughter happy I'm safe again for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Folk

customer_reviews.title: Cats Favorite Spot
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little bit to get it set up, the tension was tough for me. ( either that or im weak AF) The suction cups took a bit to stick and after my cat falling a couple times I finally showed it the business and got it to stick. Since then, its been my cats favorite spot. He can actively patrol for lizards on the bay window and alert us if they are in viewing distance >_<
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous to use this product initially because my cat weighs about 16 pounds but after following the instructions exactly how it says to adhere the sections to the window it held up great. It’s still holding up he uses this every single day he loves to sleep in it and I absolutely love the products. As long as my cat is happy I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for 23 lb cat.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t so sure of this perch when I first opened the box, but after setting it up and having my cat test it out, I have to say I love it. Assembly was very easy. I followed the instructions and cleaned the suction cups very well, and I am happy to say that the suction cups are very secure on the window. I have a very large cat (23 lbs), and he fits perfectly on it. Overall great, affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lee

customer_reviews.title: Measure first!
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions! Suction cups do need to be reapplied with weather changes, not often. Wash the window with window cleaner and cups in soapy water and dry. Press suction cups to window and a minute. I’ve bought so many brands of window perches, and these by far are superior! They jump on them, chew the coated lines with no damage. Have two, getting two more!
customer_reviews.author: BHill

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but My cats love it. Hope it doesn’t fall.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this thing. So far it has stayed up (knock on wood), but the suction cups have gotten gaps in them a couple times where I just needed to go push it into the window again. Haven’t come off all the way as of yet. I guess the bigger problem is that the little carabiner clip doesn’t actually reach all the way to clip. So I guess I’ll have to find a replacement for it?
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am (not)

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. It took me longer to assemble than it did to break it. I have two cats who fight over the hammock so i bought another one. I bought this one because it came with a toy, I had a problem clipping the hook to the suction cups and broke the spare. After I assembled, I cleaned the windows and put it up with the toy. My cat couldn't wait to jump on it to investigate. After 2 minutes it fell and now one of the hooks is bent. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cats love it and we'll built
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it!! Pretty well built. It's been up for a couple of weeks and still holding fast. Had one small mishap when both my cats tried to use at once. Would not hold both and it's not really big enough for two cats to lounge comfortably. They love it though and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Broken Cable
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this cat perch! I bought two a few months ago and they were working pretty well. Occasionally, a suction cup would slip down the window a bit, but no big deal. However, a couple weeks ago, one of my cats was in the perch and the cable broke. Fortunately, kitty was fine, but startled. I contacted the Seller and asked for a new cable and he said he would send one. However, it's been nearly three weeks and I haven't received the cable. I am disappointed in this product and the lack of timely responsiveness of the Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts....
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this window perch because my female cat loved the last one, however it is missing one of the metal hooks and carabiners making it completely unusable. I will reach out to the seller about this issue and post an update. As of now... I will be returning :-(
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla G

customer_reviews.title: WONT STAY UP!
customer_reviews.text: I have to figure out a way to keep it attached to window, my poor cat is a afraid it it now since she fell twice. YES I cleaned window, I used the sticky things in fact used 3 on one side and it wont stay up. Ill buy something to fix it when I get a day off disappointed in the item to say the least but NOT as much as my cat lol
customer_reviews.author: Mark Manz

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it to the point it broke.
customer_reviews.text: My cats use it on a daily basis and they would sleep on it for hours and hours. After a few months of using, the string snapped in the middle. It was a WONDERFUL bed. It was a disappointment that it broke. I am not sure if it is because I got a second cat and both of them gained some weight and liked to groom each other on the bed. I am not sure if I will be buying a replacement. They have been bugging me to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: OWLette

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this product
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what it says. Once you get the suction cups right, it will not give you a problem. However, the plastic has cracked for me before. I contacted customer service and they told me they improved the sturdiness of the product and will be sending me a new one. Great customer service! My cats love this product and it is one of their favorite spots in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups require a little effort
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hammock for the kitten i had recently found and so far this has been great for him! He uses it all the time whenever he feels like laying in the sun. The frame and hammock itself are very easy to construct. My only downside for this is the suction cups. The suction cups do come with adhesive pads in case the cups themselves don't work, which i used, but my only gripe is that i only wanted to use the suction cups without have to deal with sticking the pads to my window. Overall great product, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Tjaden

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to assemble. Instructions were poorly written. Won’t be able to use it because the angle of suction does not allow it to stat put. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: IntegrationCoach

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best investments I have ever made for my cat. He's spends a majority of his time on it now, and it keeps him off of my bed (mostly!). It was easy to put up and I had no issues with suction or anything else. It came with a little suction mouse toy and two extra suction cups, which was nice. The material is a bit rough, so I put a small bath mat on top and my cat loved it even more. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer_33

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my chunky monkees. I was waiting to get a picture before i posted a review. The instructions were clear on how to assemble except on how to place wires in holes of suction cups. It has extra parts if you need to move it but only can move it one other time. Its only made with black pvc pipe so if it does break its easily fixed. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted Two Weeks 😥
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved this perch until one of the poles snapped after purchasing the item after a week. I still allowed my cats to use it, eventhough they would find themselves not being evenly placed in the center of the perch. After two weeks, I took the perch down because the unevenness caused the perch to not be able to stay attached to the window.
customer_reviews.author: Eloradanan

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved this
customer_reviews.text: I had the product for approximately three weeks and then my cat fell off it when the suction cups no longer held. I contacted the seller and he sent me a stickers to put between the window and the suction cups but then it can never be moved. So when I moved I brought it with me and could no longer put it up. I have been to Home Depot and Lowe's and can't seem to find a suction cup that will hold the weight. My kitten is only 8 pounds. If I never moved it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ProGolfChick

customer_reviews.title: Adaptable - sorta
customer_reviews.text: Too long for basement apartment windows. I eventually used a hook into the crown molding along the ceiling, without two of the suction cups. Instructions are ok, but the extra parts could use explanation: white circles are stick on enhancements that help secure the suction cups to make them more sturdy; extra suction cup just in case; and an extra carabiner clip - came in handy when I bent the first one trying to fit it into the suction cup. Overall,10lbs cat loves it. 25lbs cat isn’t interested.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups do not stay, wire is not strong at all.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible, the suction cups never stayed on, even after I followed instructions and tried all the tricks. It was always a battle with it, I would not recommend this product to anybody the wire eventually snapped on me. Just a major waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Stable window perch
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and fits securely on any window or door. My cat is 20 lb and the supports him very well. This would make a great gift for someone who has a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it! It was easy to hang!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a sliding glass door in my room, and my cats love it! I was worried that it wouldn’t hold my cats one of them is 15+lbs but they’ve all been in it at the same time and it didn’t budge. They tend to hang out there 2 at a time though. I put a small warm bed on it and they are always up there! Will purchase more in the near future! Also loved that it came with a small window toy that really got the cats interested in it and they’re still playing with it which is impressive for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it, super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Diego loves it! And he’s a big kitty, 13 pounds! He sleeps on it every night, jumping on and off of it multiple times a day. The suction cups didn’t stay put immediately, but after washing the window and soaking them in hot water they’ve worked fine for 3 months now without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Head

customer_reviews.title: Owned for 2 years - still happy!
customer_reviews.text: This cat perch has been one of my most favorite purchases since I got my fur baby Freyja. I've owned this product for 2 years now and have no had to change the suction cups or wire. It has no problem supporting my 12lb cat even when she's jumping up and down on it on the daily. I cannot recommend this item enough for pet owners!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Staubs

customer_reviews.title: Suction Cups
customer_reviews.text: Suction cup ripped out in less than 6 months. ( I do have a large cat @ 16 lbs. but that is far under what the product was rated for). Therefore Making this product worthless.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: So far ive had it for about a month and its holding 2 cats really well. One has anxiety so sometimes she over eats and throws it back up. So the other day she trew up on her bed and it was so easy to clean! Like i litterally just unhooked it and shabang! My only issue is the suction cup stickers. But im going to blame florida heat for melting them. This is so much better than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it but it broke
customer_reviews.text: It was great until both sides of the PVC inner support broke while my cat (who weighs only 14 lbs) was jumping up. I’ve made it functional but I’m disappointed that this item didn’t hold up better. It is nice that it is a larger size and even broken my cat still sits in it.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for 😺
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is great. One of my cats loves it, the other one has no interest in it. It is good quality and feels very sturdy on the window. My only complaint is the actual surface are of the mesh material hammock part. The pvc take an inch away from each side. It seems quite small for multiple cats. It’s definitely a squeeze to fit my two 11lb cats up there. However, it has no issue accommodating their weight.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this, at first he was a bit weary because I didn’t have a direct way for him to jump on it I had to stack cat litter for him to reach it. The product is great and is sturdy, I have a big guy about 15 pounds and long and this was good for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat approves.... Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this perch. It's been on our big bay window for over a year and our cat uses it daily. I've not had any of the suction cups release since installing it in that location. Love it and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked at first
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice at first, but I can't seem to get the suction cups to stay more then a couple days on the window. My cats absolutly loved it, but keeps falling and I have tried everything. I think I will reporpouse into a wall shelf
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: The window perch is fantastic. My cats love being able to look out the window. My only complaint is that sometimes the suction cups fall. It may be due to my windows or my cats roughhousing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne N. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it just the way it is... only downfall is can’t close the blinds over it so people can always see in. Super sturdy and we even hook toys on it and through it. Also can’t open window because cats on it will just make it slide shut.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia L Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Quality of materials pretty good. Suction good can almost pull the pane out. Lol. Is it worth $30? Maybe, maybe not. Fits one medium kitty comfortably. Two, not really unless they are small.
customer_reviews.author: C2daE

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loved it, but it broke after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: It fell a few times from either the suction cups coming undone, or the peg support on the bottom slipping out, but those are easy to fix. However the support wire came undone after 4 months and now our kitty is depressed.
customer_reviews.author: Inkypig

customer_reviews.title: BEST $30 EVER SPENT (in my cat's opinion)
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this hammock bed so much that she has started sleeping on it at night rather than in bed with me. Might have to return to get my cuddle buddy back! For real though, this product is well made, and the cats obviously love it. Also comes with a super cute toy that the cats surprisingly like! Definitely measure out your window before buying it, cause it is pretty big, but SUCH A GOOD PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: dal2030

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stay stuck! Tried everything. Kinda disappointed. Would have been perfect had it stayed up. My cats liked it til it didn't work a week after buying.
customer_reviews.author: allieireland

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: This cat perch is awesome! Very sturdy & easy to assemble. Would recommend using the included stickers for tougher suction on a window in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Mickley

customer_reviews.title: Great seller and service.
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write reviews but, felt I needed to share my experience. I purchased the cat window perch and my cat loves it. It was simple to put together. I had a problem with one of the cable loops but an email to Mark and the problem was solved. Mark sent numerous emails keeping me advised of when he would send the replacement cable and made sure the cable arrived promptly. Fantastic customer service for a product my cat adores!
customer_reviews.author: Darin R Parr

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Good item but you cannot have blinds or curtains Hass to be in a window that a cat can jump up on I don’t even use it put it up for two days and my cats would have nothing to do with it
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Just okay. Suction cups no longer stay on
customer_reviews.text: After a while, the suction cups fail to hold it up. Cats loved it at first, but now just wont stay up on the window after the suction cups have been in window a few months.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth getting.
customer_reviews.text: This would not stick to the window. Our cats were very excited about our purchase but after it kept falling down we just stoped putting it back up. It was also not very stable and wobbled a lot. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ann

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT stay up
customer_reviews.text: I was careful to read reviews and chose something that I thought would hold up. I bought 2 of this item and each one has fallen down each day since I have put them up. They even fell WITHOUT my cat in them! I have tried every trick in the book to get the suction cups to stick, but nothing will keep them stuck on the windows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my cats love it. It was very easy to assemble and attach to the window. Currently my youngest cat is sunbathing and people watching. Update: Customer service with this company is amazing. With 3 cats prime sun bathing spots are hard to come by. This perch is their favorite spot.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves this Perch
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I have ever made for an animal. She is on her perch all the time and she plays rough on it and the suctions do not come off.
customer_reviews.author: KathyG

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd, had to get another when my daughter brought home a cat from college. The cats LOVE these perches. Really great item. One of my cats is really light (the one in the picture is about 8 lbs), my daughters cat is quite a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted about a year and half before it broke down. Surprisingly I had no issue with the suction cups. It was the PVC that started to fall apart. I will definitely buy another one. As long as you clean your window and the suction cups before placing them you should have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Nosey cat
customer_reviews.text: My male cat loves to look out of the window so I purchased this for him to be able to lay and relax in the sun. Easy to assemble and he is obsessed with sitting a cackling at birds. This is his new bed. My female cat won't even look at the thing. I put down a nice throw blanket for me him to feel even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Davalos

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING I EVER BOUGHT FOR MY BABIES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby girl and she loves it... When I wake up in the morning she is always there watching the squirrels and birds. Lately her big brother has taken it over (suddenly) and he won't move off it except to eat... she can't get on there with him (he's 17 lbs.) so I'm buying a 2nd one so they have their own. Tried to add photo but it would not allow.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitties, perfect size as wel
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats who LOVE it. I put a blanket on mine so they would like it a bit more but both my indoor and outdoor cats love it. Even holds them both up with a total of 34 pounds together
customer_reviews.author: Sydney McBroom

customer_reviews.title: Heavy load, no prob
customer_reviews.text: This cat perch is great. I have two cats, one is 18lbs. They both fit on the perch comfortably with no worries of the suction cups failing. Others smaller perches have dropped the big guy unfortunately. They can cuddle together or really stretch out one at a time. Will definitely buy another!
customer_reviews.author: katy baker

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & well made
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how good this would hold up but is actually really good! My cats enjoy it so much in their closet I did for them. I would buy again and recommend it. 😺
customer_reviews.author: Austin cross

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is a super fan of this window perch. It has held up well for about two months. My kitten is only about 6lbs, but it appears to be very sturdy when he jumps in and out. (Bed not included.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: It did not stay upright. In addition to the suction cups, it came with extra sticky pads. I wanted to be able to take this down easily... And move it. I did not want to stick stickers on my window. The suction cups just didn’t work and the cats ended up falling out of it... I have sent it back within a day
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Parry-Hill

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have two fairly heavy cats (one wide at 14 lbs, the other long at about 15 lbs) and they both sit up here together just fine! And they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ansmn

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Fats loves his new seat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our cats because they love to sit in the window. They absolutely love it. Our Mr. Fats thinks he’s the king of the world up there. We’ve had no problems with it staying up and he weighs about 14 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: No Worries Adventures

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. He lays in it all of the time. Friends that came over we’re impressed. I encourage anyone with a kitty to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Its very well made and I like the mesh its made of. They would not go near it for 2 wks! It can fall down very easily and that scared them. You have to make sure the suction cups are sealed well on the glass window. Other than that they now enjoy the window seat.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D

customer_reviews.title: Must have for ALL cat owners!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to EVERY cat owner!!! The cats absolutely love it and there's surely a spot for one of these in every house. Cost effective and truly brightens your feline's day; why wouldn't you get one!!?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin E.

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups need to be clean and window clean a little moisture will help
customer_reviews.text: I love the window perch. Had a little trouble getting the suction cups to hold but finally got it. I have a 15 pound cat and he fits on the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Trusty

customer_reviews.title: White
customer_reviews.text: This perch is purrfect (size, style, material) and is not as obstructive as the other perches that connect to the window from above. This one has a sleek look and is sturdy- I set my printer (HP Envy 5000) on it and it held fine. Lol. Our cat Jesse is 11 lbs and he can jump on and off of it easily without it budging. The toy that is included holds well also! Jesse loves sitting here and watching the birds and trees all day-great addition to our home (:
customer_reviews.author: Sam_96

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! It took me a while before they got used to it. But now they take turns To use it! I haven’t seen it together on top of it lol
customer_reviews.author: Daysi Villalta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups are useless and fell on the first day. Tried everything to make them stick. Cleaned the window, used some water and let them sit without weight for a while. Still fell off after only a few minutes with the cats.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gordon

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP, NOT STURDY, DOESN'T HOLD
customer_reviews.text: This thing is supposed to hold up to 60 lbs, which is a complete joke considering my 4lb kitten keeps knocking it down
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats who are 9 and 13 pounds. They love this perch. We haven't had any issues or concerns with their weight on it. This hammock is sturdy - the suction cups industrial! Both of our cats have been on the perch at the same time it hasn't faltered!
customer_reviews.author: d_stevens

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Does not fall
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cat perch I bought. The first one I purchased (from another company) fell , causing my cat to crash down to the ground from a deep sleep. This one has been able to hold both my cats and they love it. This is a great perch!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be in a large window, the perch is too big for a standard sized window. Measure before buying! We only used the suction cups, but it comes with additional pieces for better suction (I recommend using) and it constantly falls off our window with and without the cat using it. Would be great if it would stay on the window.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Broken less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed I haven't even had the hammock a month and the connector piece that holds the side up split. My cat is not overweight and is well within the weight limit for this product. I can't believe it didn't even last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Measure your windows!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it will be sturdy and great for the cats but I didn’t Measure! It won’t fit any windows or doors I have! I wish they made it in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Speechy Gal

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This window perch is pretty sturdy and easy to assemble. I have 3 cats and they love sun bathing a lot. I thought this window perch would be perfect for them. My youngest cat absolutely loves hanging out on the perch yet the other two are still figuring out. I’m happy that my cats are loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and my kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: My furbabies love this! Very sturdy! Fits nice matches anyroom! Definitely recommend this measure your window first though it’s quit large but amazing! My kitties have amazing taste!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Elbow tubing broke after 1-2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product as much as my cat did, but it broke soon after getting it. In a week one of the elbow tubes cracked but the perch did not seem too affected. However, this past week another elbow tubing completely cracked and now it is broken. My cat is not overweight and I followed all the directions, so I am quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I got this put together and put on the window but as soon as my cat jumped on it feel and came off with her with it, she will not make that same mistake again - I had to return
customer_reviews.author: Daniele Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Three cats
customer_reviews.text: They love it but do a number on the suction cups
customer_reviews.author: Esther Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Put it up and within two days the cable came out of the tie. Completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gotta get this perch
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cat perch. This is way better than the previous one i had. Worth the price. Design is great!
customer_reviews.author: mosckb2

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are not strong!
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if the suction cups worked! My cat keeps falling!! :(
customer_reviews.author: KimTreloar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Great Price, Buy 2 if you have more than 1 cat!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I used to have a less expensive version and it broke beyond repair. This one is much better. Materials are are sturdy. Extra suction cup and metal clip included should one fail or become lost. My cats love it. I will probably order another - I have 3 cats and they all fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be great- wish it stayed up
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it, but it falls off about once a week, and we have to clean the suction cups and reapply them.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Great but 1 support rod is not working making it collapses
customer_reviews.text: This item is really great. Keeps my small dog from sitting on the back off my couch and ruining the back of the couch. PROBLEM : 1 of the support bars will not stay in place so it collapses. So now it we can not use it . BUMMER
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: This lasted two days with what felt like 20 Times falling off the window - got returned
customer_reviews.author: Liesa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay on. I have to fix it 5-6 times a day. My cats actually scared of it now because it's collapsed on her many times. Though hilarious when it has happened, I feel bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lori ann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups are constantly coming off even though cups and window have been cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Car perch. Good suction cups but insufficient engineering
customer_reviews.text: The cats like the cat perch. I have 2 cats maximum weight 8kg, 18 lbs together. Usually 1 at a time on the perch. After 1 year in operation the middle connector broke/cracked on both sides of the perch. In most places in the world you should be able to find a new connector at your local hardware shop. Jm
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Michel demaret

customer_reviews.title: My cats live on this thing..lol
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this ... they are in it most of the day holding up good
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wear

product_meta.title: Cat Perch Cat Window Perch Window Cat Perch Hammock Cat Window Hammock Bed Cat Window Seat Kitty Window Sunny Seat Durable Big Pet Perch with Upgraded 4 Big Suction Cups Cat Bed Holds Up to 60lbs
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFeatures:

Why not give your LOVELY CAT a Special Gift?

🐱 STURDY AND SAFTY
Raytops Cat Window Perch Hammock made with Industrial Strength 3 ¼’ suction cups tested for maximum adherence, super sturdy PVC tubes and ⅛’ Plastic Coated Stainless Steel Cables which provide exceptional stability.

🐱 ENJOY AND FUN
You lovely cat will definitely enjoy a happy sunbathing on this Cat Window Perch/ Sunny Cat Sill Widow Seat Perch Bed. Because Cats always looking for a place can have better vision of outside and enjoy sunbath.

🐱 EASY TO ASSEMBLE
No tools needed and easy to follow the instruction guide asseble quick and effortless.

🐱 SAVING SPACE
The Cat Bed Window Perch Hammock which allow to be mounted by any level of windows and save place.

🐱ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS
PP suction cups, PVC Frame, Stell Wire,durable fabric cover.

🐱IMPORTANT NOTE
- To avoid suction cups falling, please make sure the suction cups and window are clean.
- Put the suction cups into warm water (50℃-70℃) for 2-4 minutes.Dry with a little bit water and sticking to window. Simple and very helpful to make the suction cups powerful. .

SUPER EASY TO INSTALL! 

The Cat Perch can be installed in few seconds to glass windows and doors.

ACCOMMODATE ANY SIZE CAT!

* Product Dimensions: 26.6" x 15.57" x 1.8"( L x W x H )
* Tough weather-resistant fabric cover is easy to remove, machine washable and built to withstand scratching.
* The support cables are 1/12" x 26" Stainless Steel to last FOREVER.

PACKAGING INCLUDING:

5x Suction Cups(1 is spare parts)
2x 24" PVC Pipes
2x 12.2" PVC Pipes
2x T Pipes
2x Elbow Pipes
2x Stainless Steel Cables
1x Weather-resistant Cotton cat bed hammock
Cat window Perch,Cat Perch Window，Window shelf for cats,Cat Bed Window Perch,Cat Window Hammock Perch
feature_bullets: 🐱THE BEST CAT WINDOW BED PERCH FOR YOUR CAT --All cats like to enjoy the sunbath and better view.This large mounted window cat bed perch hammock seats is special design for your cats. The sunny cat window seat perch for large cats will provide a nice view and comfortable sunbathing for your lovely kitten !

🐱 LARGE CAT WINDOW BED HAMMOCK FOR ANY TYPES CAT - This cat window seat perch is fit for small, large or 2 cats stay on at the same time. This hanging kitty cot window perches for large cats and the length is 28.5" and width 15", stainless steel cord length 23". Suction cup diameter 3.5".mesh cover is cut exactly from food grade and breathable placemat materials. Waterproof, breathable and durable. Easy to clean !

🐱 BIG SUCTION CUPS HOLD UP TO 60LBS -- Extra strong and special designed 3.5" big suction cup for this window mounted cat bed and the window seat perch can hold up to 60lbs. Easy to mount or change the place and offer much greater reliability and lifetime under sunlight and heat than other window sill cat perch !

🐱 SAVE SPACE AND NO TOOLS REQUIRED -- The window hammock cat perch bed will save your place and cats will enjoy this safe and comfortable kitty window perch. Also cat toys will coming with cat ledge window perch hammock together as free gift !

🐱 IMPORTANT NOTE -- Please make sure to clean the windows and suction cups before mounted.If the suction cup not mounted well, The simplest solution is put it into warm water (50℃-70℃) for 2-4 minutes.Dry with a little bit water then sticking to the window. Simple and very helpful to make the suction cups powerful.If have any questions please feel free to contact us at any time.Add to cart now and give your LOVELY CAT a Cat Window Perch Hammock Bed as a sunbath space!
